backend/main.mo: Main canister defining user profiles, habits, records, investment diary types, access control, and related query/update methods with logging and migration support.
backend/migration.mo: No-op migration module that maps old actor state to the new structure without transformation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented frontend features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of all major frontend components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global style layer defining OKLCH color tokens and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the React application and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level application logic handling identity, actor readiness, profile loading, diagnostics, timeouts, and rendering the appropriate UI state.
frontend/src/components/CollapsibleHabit: UI panel providing a collapsible wrapper around the HabitManager component for toggling habit management visibility.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component that captures rendering errors and displays a provided fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/FatalErrorFallba: Fallback UI for unrecoverable errors offering reload and retry actions with error details.
frontend/src/components/HabitGrid.tsx: Renders a scrollable habit grid for a selected month with record mapping, editing, and completion toggling.
frontend/src/components/HabitManager.tsx: Provides UI and logic to create, edit, update, and delete habits including units, targets, and default amounts.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with navigation tabs, user info, and logout options.
frontend/src/components/InvestmentGoalCa: Empty component file with no implemented content.
Manages investment diary entries and goal creation with dialogs, validation, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/LoadingTimeoutFa: Shows a diagnostic fallback UI when loading stalls, including backend reachability checks and debug export.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Displays the login interface using Internet Identity with branding and a login button.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyTargetsEd: Renders monthly habit targets by filtering applicable habits and computing monthly totals and targets from records.
frontend/src/components/MonthTabs.tsx: Renders horizontally scrollable month tabs that clamp and emit month selections.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Provides a simple form to save a user's name and create their profile with validation and feedback.
frontend/src/components/ProgressCharts.t: Generates monthly progress visuals including a pie chart, per-habit progress bars, and daily trend data using calculated stats.
frontend/src/components/ReportExportDial: Empty file or placeholder for a report export dialog component.
frontend/src/components/TrackerDashboard: Main dashboard coordinating habit data, monthly records, views, and child components like charts, grids, and target editors.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity changes, refetching dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReachabilit: Checks whether the backend is reachable by calling a diagnostic method and reporting status with logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, stored identities, and related status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLoadingWatchdog.ts: Implements a timeout watchdog that triggers a callback if a loading state exceeds a specified duration.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreserveHorizontal: Hook that tracks and restores an elementâ€™s horizontal scroll position across renders.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for profiles, habits, and mutations with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry that initializes React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the app.
frontend/src/types/investments.ts: Defines the InvestmentGoal interface mirroring backend types.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty declaration file placeholder for jspdf typings.
frontend/src/utils/diagnostics.ts: In-memory diagnostics logger that records events with timestamps and formats timelines.
frontend/src/utils/duration.ts: Utilities to parse, validate, and format time durations in seconds.
frontend/src/utils/fileDownload.ts: Generates export filenames based on date ranges.
frontend/src/utils/habitUnit.ts: Helpers for converting and checking HabitUnit values and creating unit definitions.
frontend/src/utils/investments.ts: Formatting helpers for dates and amounts plus investment progress calculations.
frontend/src/utils/reportCsv.ts: Generates CSV export of habits and records and triggers client-side download.
frontend/src/utils/reportDateRange.ts: Converts dates to UTC-based components and formats them for reports.
frontend/src/utils/reportPdf.ts: Empty file for future PDF report generation.
frontend/src/utils/reportStats.ts: Calculates habit report statistics including per-habit progress, daily completion stats, and volume metrics over a date range.
frontend/src/utils/steadyClimbPlan.ts: Provides monthly fitness targets and helpers to look up targets for supported habits based on month.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and enabled plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the project state and requirements for adding an Investment Diary and multi-goal Investment Goals module.
